sentences.sContent: The title is printed in italics.
She addressed them by hand in her beautiful italic script.
sentences.sCn: 她用她漂亮的斜体字亲笔给他们写信。

words.tran: 在字下划横线；用斜体字排字；强调

trans.tranOther: Italics are letters that slope to the right. Italics are often used to emphasize a particular word or sentence. The examples in this dictionary are printed in italics.
Italic letters slope to the right
